author: zahary.
content: <@363800010518822915>, you've mentioned that you are already applying the upcoming spec simplifications (crosslinks removal, etc). Would we need to do that as well in order to join one of your testnets?

author: terence0083
content: <@553610810652622860> nope you dont, the work is on an experimental branch and it's not going to be applied to the testnet until a formal release (0.8.5?)

author: zahary.
content: ok, thanks. how about the 0.8.4 network spec? do you guys already have the chunked responses for the sync requests?

author: terence0083
content: yep we should already have that in

author: nishant0
content: hey <@553610810652622860> we have been updated with the 0.8.4 network spec for a while, and it is currently running in our testnet.

author: terence0083
content: my next set of goals  to get remove shard/crosslink and naive aggregations strategy into a staging test net so we can experiment things there as well
